summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1416, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue, from Union Street to Pike Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation,, and by constructing granite curbs, together with all sewers and water mains, with their appurtenances, necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 15358 assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
